      • countryComboBox

        public void countryComboBox()
        puts the data in observable list to be able to be displayed i

        lambda takes country objects and gets their country_ID for comparison and returns a specific integer based on whether it is more or less than the country being compared to in order to implement a way to order the values within the list because sets are unordered

        Sets up the combo box for listed countries
